alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Clusters of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Morgan and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking clusters of strong thunderstorms across the advisory area. The strongest cell was centered 10 miles southeast of Moulton. All storms are moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Moulton, Trinity, Courtland, Hillsboro, Chalybeate Springs, Speake, Caddo, Basham and Wren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
